verses.name: Job 28:1
verses.text: Surely there is a vein for the silver, and a place for gold where they fine it.

verses.name: Job 28:2
verses.text: Iron is taken out of the earth, and brass is molten out of the stone.

verses.name: Job 28:3
verses.text: He setteth an end to darkness, and searcheth out all perfection: the stones of darkness, and the shadow of death.

verses.name: Job 28:4
verses.text: The flood breaketh out from the inhabitant; even the waters forgotten of the foot: they are dried up, they are gone away from men.

verses.name: Job 28:5
verses.text: As for the earth, out of it cometh bread: and under it is turned up as it were fire.
